content: Total company adjusted cost of sales, which exclude reimbursable expenses and non-cash stock-based compensation expense totaled $41.2 million or 58.1% of revenues before reimbursements in the third quarter of 2022, as compared to $43.6 million or 61% of revenues before reimbursements in the prior year. Adjusted net income, which excludes non-cash stock-based compensation expense and restructuring activity in the third quarter of 2022, total $11.8 million or adjusted diluted net income per common share of $0.37, which is above the high-end of our earnings guidance range.
